channel.title: Is there a way when you hit a player you heal the hp what you hit
channel.description:
Hello my name is vincent, i have succesfully after 3 weeks of working on and trying to find ways to make turmoil on allstar base but I have succesfully did.
My new project is to make soulsplit I want to know what type of code would be able to make you heal what ever you hit for 30 secconds do you have any code for something similar or something made out of scratch an idea. thanks if you reply ~vince~ ;D ;D
